body:
Spack fails to build Octave with Intel compiler due to C++ to Fortran calling convention issues.

### Expected Result

Builds Octave with Intel compiler.

### Actual Result

Fails to build Octave with Intel compiler.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec octave+qt~readline@4.2.1 %intel@17.0.5 ^openblas threads=openmp
...
$ spack --restage install octave+qt~readline@4.2.1 %intel@17.0.5 ^openblas threads=openmp
...
==> Installing octave
==> Using cached archive: /lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/cache/octave/octave-4.2.1.tar.gz
==> Already staged octave-4.2.1-o3lrrnoctonlzgx4wgbsyfqnqciabj3l in /lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/octave-4.2.1-o3lrrnoctonlzgx4wgbsyfqnqciabj3l
==> Already patched octave
==> Building octave [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:

--prefix=/lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-17.0.5/octave-4.2.1-o3lrrnoctonlzgx4wgbsyfqnqciabj3l'
 '--with-blas=-L/lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-17.0.5/openblas-0.2.20-247hkbjuggrspe2oyvq2smt
inigdpvml/lib -lopenblas' '--with-lapack=-L/lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-17.0.5/openblas-0.2
.20-247hkbjuggrspe2oyvq2smtinigdpvml/lib -lopenblas' '--disable-readline' '--without-arpack' '--without-curl' '--wi
thout-fftw3' '--without-fftw3f' '--without-fltk' '--without-glpk' '--without-magick' '--without-hdf5' '--disable-ja
va' '--without-opengl' '--without-framework-opengl' '--without-qhull' '--without-qrupdate' '--without-z'

1 error found in build log:

/lib64 -L/lib/../lib64/ -L/usr/lib/../lib64 -L/usr/lib/../lib64/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/../../../
 -L/lib64 -L/lib/ -L/usr/lib64 -L/usr/lib -limf -lm -lifport -lifcoremt -lsvml -lipgo -lirc -lpthread -lirc_s -ldl
```
